parade 0.11.0
  • Reference
    • Parade core: declarative flows, types, and execution
    • SLURM defaults, profiles, and NA = omit
    • SLURM defaults & profiles (NA = omit)
    • Scratch-first paths & registries: project://, artifacts://, registry://
    • SLURM script submission from R: submit_slurm(), script_top(), jobs_top()
    • Artifacts: clean side-effects, atomic writes, and manifests
    • Distribution: local and SLURM (barriers, throttling, chunking)

Alias for file_ref function

Create local distribution specification

Create SLURM distribution specification

Add distribution settings to a parade flow

Explain a flow: DAG + distribution + sinks

Extract failed rows from flow results

Create a file reference type specification
